Privacy

ExPatPup's privacy policy

ExPatPup uses Google AdSense - this means that third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to this or other websites.

You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings. (Alternatively, you can opt out of a third-party vendorâ€™s use of cookies for personalized advertising by visiting www.aboutads.info.)
